text: Sergei Fyodorovich Puponov (; born 8 April 1982) is a former Russian football player. Puponov made a single appearance in the Russian Premier League with FC Saturn Ramenskoye. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Saturn Ramenskoye players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Sergei Puponov
